sense.gloss: to be in charge of, to manage, to direct, to administer, to preside over
to rule, to govern, to control

sdata.j: その↑省↑↓しょう↓は↑内政↑↓ないせい↓↑問題↑↓もんだい↓の↑行政↑↓ぎょうせい↓を|つかさどる|。
sdata.e: The ministry administers the internal affairs.

sdata.j: ↑市長↑↓しちょう↓は↑市政↑↓しせい↓を↑司↑↓|つかさど↓る|。
sdata.e: The mayor administers the affairs of the city.
